name: paythree-avax
description: PayThree - Employee and HR Portal for ESOP and Payroll Management on Avalanche

scripts.build: npm run build:employee && npm run build:hr
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd employee-portal && npm install && cd ../hr-portal && npm install
scripts.lint: cd employee-portal && npm run lint && cd ../hr-portal && npm run lint

author: Gaurav Soni
